<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Waxed Feathers](/Feats.aspx?ID=2436) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=240" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 58 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Wavediver Tengu](/Heritages.aspx?ID=112) heritage

</column>

---

Your feathers are coated in a waxy substance that repels water. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against effects that have the [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165) trait. So long as you're in a dry place, you can spend one action to shake off any water that clings to your clothing and feathers to instantly become dry.
name: Waxed Feathers
